alert.note: Alert for Logan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 9:28AM MDT until July 20 at 10:15AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 1015 AM MDT. * At 927 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Westplains, or 25 miles northwest of Sterling, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Westplains around 935 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include North Sterling Reservoir and Padroni. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
